Name:       Fira Sans
Homepage:   http://mozilla.github.io/Fira/
Homepage:   http://www.mozilla.org/en-US/styleguide/products/firefox-os/typeface/
Download:   http://www.mozilla.org/en-US/styleguide/products/firefox-os/typeface/
Download:   http://dev.carrois.com/wordpress/wp-content/uploads/downloads/fira_3105/FiraSans3105.zip
Version:    3.105
License:    Open Font License 1.1
Publisher:  Mozilla
Designer:   Erik Spiekermann & Ralph du Carrois (Carrois Type Design)
Designed:   2013
Derivation: Meta

Designed to integrate with the character of the Firefox OS, the Fira
Sans typeface also aims to cover the legibility needs for a large range
of handsets varying in screen quality and rendering.
